item.name: Rookery Wines
item.address1: PO Box 132, Kingscote, Kangaroo Island, SA 5223
item.description: Garry and Gael Lovering have established 3.2ha of cabernet sauvignon and 1.6ha of shiraz, with smaller plantings of sauvignon blanc, tempranillo, saperavi, sangiovese, chardonnay, merlot, petit verdot, riesling and zinfandel. Kangaroo Island is one of SAs best-kept secrets, a place of genuine magic with its aquatic life, amazing coastline sculpture, wild flowers and prolific native fauna.
